name: witcher-ts-oop-practice
description: The Witcher Creature Manager is a command-line application designed for fans of the Witcher universe, allowing users to create and interact with various fantasy creatures. Leveraging Object-Oriented Programming principles in TypeScript, the app enables users to create monsters, humans, and horses, each with unique attributes and abilities.
author: Mary Elenius (https://www.linkedin.com/in/404pandas)
